featured.title: The Future of AIF Regulations in GIFT City: A Legal Perspective
featured.excerpt: As GIFT City continues to evolve as India's premier international financial services center, the regulatory landscape for Alternative Investment Funds (AIFs) is undergoing significant transformation. This article explores the latest regulatory developments and their implications for fund managers and investors.
featured.author: Aditi Abhyankar
